posts.title: Welcome to Our Platform
posts.excerpt: Learn about our platform and what makes it special.
posts.content:
# Welcome to Our Platform

We're excited to have you here! This platform is designed to help you achieve your goals.

## Key Features

- Powerful automation
- Beautiful interface
- Scalable infrastructure

posts.title: Getting Started Guide
posts.excerpt: A comprehensive guide to help you get started with our platform.
posts.content:
# Getting Started Guide

This guide will walk you through the basics of using our platform.

## Step 1: Sign Up

Create your account to get started.

## Step 2: Explore Features

Take some time to explore the available features.

posts.title: Advanced Tips and Tricks
posts.excerpt: Discover advanced features and productivity tips.
posts.content:
# Advanced Tips and Tricks

Here are some advanced tips to help you get the most out of our platform.

## Keyboard Shortcuts

- Ctrl+K: Quick search
- Ctrl+/: Command palette

## Power User Features

Explore automation and integrations.
